org.lexgrid.extension.valuedomain
Interface LexEVSValueDomainServices

All Superinterfaces:
org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Extensions.Extendable, org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Extensions.Generic.GenericExtension, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
LexEVSValueDomainServicesImpl
public interface LexEVSValueDomainServices
extends org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Extensions.Generic.GenericExtension

Value Domain extension for LexGrid.

Author:
Sridhar Dwarkanath

isConceptInDomain

org.LexGrid.LexBIG.DataModel.Core.AbsoluteCodingSchemeVersionReference isConceptInDomain(java.lang.String entityCode,
                                                                                         java.net.URI valueDomainURI)
                                                                                         throws org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException
Determine if the supplied entity code is a valid result for the supplied value domain and, if it is, return the particular codingSchemeVersion that was used.

Parameters:
entityCode -
valueDomainURI -
Returns:
coding scheme and version if the entityCode is valid, null otherwise
Throws:
org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException

isConceptInDomain

org.LexGrid.LexBIG.DataModel.Core.AbsoluteCodingSchemeVersionReference isConceptInDomain(java.lang.String entityCode,
                                                                                         java.net.URI entityCodeNamespace,
                                                                                         org.LexGrid.LexBIG.DataModel.Core.CodingSchemeVersionOrTag csvt,
                                                                                         java.net.URI valueDomainURI)
                                                                                         throws org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException
Determine if the supplied entity code is a valid result for the supplied domain.

Parameters:
entityCode - entity code
entityCodeNamespace - entity code namespace (can be null if the same as the coding scheme namespace)
csvt - coding scheme version or tag
valueDomainURI - value domain URI
Returns:
The codingScheme version of that asserts that the code is in the domain or null if it isn't.
Throws:
org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException

resolveValueDomain

ResolvedValueDomainDefinition resolveValueDomain(java.net.URI valueDomainURI,
                                                 org.LexGrid.LexBIG.DataModel.Collections.AbsoluteCodingSchemeVersionReferenceList csVersionList)
                                                 throws org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException
Resolve a value domain using the supplied set of coding scheme versions.

Parameters:
valueDomainURI - value domain URI
csVersionList - list of coding scheme versions to use in resolution. IF the value domain uses a version that isn't mentioned in this list, the resolve function will return the codingScheme and version that was used as a default for the resolution.
Returns:
Resolved Value Domain Definition
Throws:
org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException

isSubDomain

boolean isSubDomain(java.net.URI childValueDomainURI,
                    java.net.URI parentValueDomainURI)
                    throws org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException
Check whether childValueDomainURI is a child of parentValueDomainURI.

Parameters:
childValueDomainURI - child value domain URI
parentValueDomainURI - parent value domain URI
Returns:
YES, if all the elements of the child domain are in the parent domain NO otherwise.
Throws:
org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException

listValueDomains

java.net.URI[] listValueDomains(java.lang.String valueDomainName)
                                throws org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException
Return the URI's for the value domain definition(s) for the supplied domain name. If the name is null, returns everything. If the name is not null, returns the value domain(s) that have the assigned name. Note: plural because there is no guarantee of valueDomain uniqueness. If the name is the empty string "", returns all unnamed valueDomains.

Parameters:
valueDomainName -
Returns:
value domain URI's
Throws:
org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException

getAllValueDomainsWithNoNames

java.net.URI[] getAllValueDomainsWithNoNames()

Return the URI's of all unnamed value domain definition(s).

Returns:
value domain URI's
Throws:
org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException

getValueDomainEntitiesForTerm

ResolvedValueDomainCodedNodeSet getValueDomainEntitiesForTerm(java.lang.String term,
                                                              java.net.URI valueDomainURI,
                                                              java.lang.String matchAlgorithm)
                                                              throws org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException
Resolves the value domain supplied and restricts to the term and matchAlgorith supplied. Return object ResolvedValueDomainCodedNodeSet contains the codingScheme URI and Version that was used to resolve and the CodedNodeSet. Note : the CodedNodeSet is unresolved

Parameters:
term - text to search
valueDomainURI - URI of ValueDomain
matchAlgorithm -
Returns:
ResolvedValueDomainCodedNodeSet containing the codingScheme URI and Version that was used to resolve and the CodedNodeSet.
Throws:
org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException

                 java.lang.String codingSchemeName,
                 org.LexGrid.LexBIG.DataModel.Core.CodingSchemeVersionOrTag csvt)
                 throws org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException

Parameters:
entityCode -
codingSchemeName -
csvt -
Returns:
TRUE : If entityCode is of type valueDomain in supplied coding scheme, FALSE : otherwise
